name: Wonderland royal crest heart necklace
description:
Intricately detailed silver heart pendent with the royal crest of wonderland,  a light hollow heart with a silky satin finish. Topped with sparkling deep red garnet set into the top of the heart with a club shaped topper for a perfectly elegant nod to wonderland. Based on the queen of hearts coat of arms and wonderland royal crest,  a heart topped with a royal crown surrounded by heraldic flourishes. 

Inspired by the beloved tale of Alice in wonderland and its literary nonsense as well as the detailed illustrations of John Tenniel. Maybe it would even be something that Alice takes with her as a souvenir of wonderland.  A timelessly elegant necklace made to be treasured. 

The heart is suspended from a 16", 18” or 20" delicate silver chain finished with a handmade silver clasp. 

Size:3.5cm across
Garnet:5mm round

All pieces are packaged in Sian Bostwick Jewellery packaging ready to be treasured.
Gift wrap available on request.

name: Springtime Forget-me-not pendant
description:
Dainty Forget-me-not pendant with 4 flowers in stunning rich blue/deep purple anodised titanium arranged on a sleek satin finished silver teardrop shape. 

In 15th-century it was supposed that the wearers of the flower would not be forgotten by their lovers so this pendant has a beautiful romantic theme and is made to be treasured. 
From the Springtime collection with a hint of fairytale and timeless elegance, perfect to bring a little   Springtime enchantment into everyday.
 
The pendant is suspended from a 16" or 18” delicate silver chain finished with a handmade silver clasp. 
Each forget-me-not is individually anodised so each flower is unique and beautiful, no 2 are exactly the same. 

Size:
Forget-me-nots : 1cm across
Silver teardrop: Width 2.5 cm x Height 3.5 cm approximately 

All pieces are packaged in Sian Bostwick Jewellery packaging ready to be treasured.
Gift wrap available on request.

name: Springtime Butterfly twisting vine necklace
description:
4 butterfly’s in bright rich blues/deep purple anodised titanium have fluttered down and are resting on a twisted and curling silver vine. The satin finished silver vine twists and spirals as the 4 butterflies rest before flying off once again.
A delicate and beautiful statement jewel for that special occasion. From the Springtime collection with a hint of fairytale and timeless elegance, perfect to bring a little Springtime enchantment into everyday. 

The butterfly’s are fixed to the twisting vine with a single rivet on each butterfly. 
Each butterfly is individually anodised, so each butterfly is unique and beautiful. no 2 butterfly’s are exactly the same. 

The butterfly vine is suspended from a 15" or 17” so that the vine sits beautifully when worn, the silver chain is delicate and finished with a handmade silver clasp. 

Size:
Butterfly’s: 1cm across
Vine: 10cm across

name: Tristan's Armour necklace
description:
Bold necklace with a strong form of Tristan's knights armour. The edgy armour shape and the elegant split necklace chain with little silver loops are in black oxidised silver reflecting Tristan's betrayal of King Mark. Highlighted elegant Victorian style detail sits on the surface of the armour piece in brushed silver.

Inspired by the enchanting Arthurian legend of Tristan & Iseult, a tale of betrayal, love and passion. The tragic 12th Century story of the love affair between the Cornish knight Tristan and the Irish princess Iseult .
Tristan's knights armour & shield become bold rings, necklaces and earrings with strong masculine forms contrasting the fine detail influenced by the the Victorian art created around the legend.

The accompanying feminine Iseult pieces will launch later, completing the couples collection and story.

Availble on a 16” or 18” chain
Size:2cm across


All pieces are packaged in Sian Bostwick Jewellery packaging ready to be treasured.
Gift wrap available on request.

Inspired by the enchanting Arthurian legend of Tristan & Iseult, a tale of betrayal, love and passion. The tragic 12th Century story of the love affair between the Cornish knight Tristan and the Irish princess Iseult .
Tristan's knights armour & shield become bold rings, necklaces and earrings with strong masculine forms contrasting the fine detail influenced by the the Victorian art created around the legend.

name: Wonderland Tea party ring
description:
Alice finds herself at the most peculiar tea party hosted my the Mad Hatter, the March Hare and a dormouse in a teapot, why is a raven like a writing desk indeed.
Cast and made from a antique teaspoon perfect for the mad hatters tea party and a subtle reference for everyday tea partys. The ring fold across 2 fingers with a elegant satin finish and beautiful detail.

name: Wonderland Playing card suit heart necklace
description:
At the end of alice adventure on wonderland, put on trail by the queen of hearts Alice cries out “You're nothing but a pack of cards!”  before waking up on the river bank.
Intricately detailed silver heart pendent with a repeated playing card suit pattern cut from the heart to form a light hollow heart with a silky satin finish. A suit of playing cards – heart, diamond, club & spade charms with beautiful silky satin finish are suspended from the chain, for a perfectly elegant nod to wonderland.

Inspired by the beloved tale of Alice in wonderland and its literary nonsense as well as the detailed illustrations of John Tenniel. Maybe it would even be something that Alice takes with her as a souvenir of wonderland.  A timelessly elegant necklace made to be treasured.
